enhanced_by.reason: Both methods involve updating the map and the expiration map, making it useful to test them together.
removeIfExpired is used internally by remove to check and remove expired entries, making it a good candidate for setting up test cases.
removeAllExpired is invoked by other methods to clean up expired entries, which can affect the state before remove is called.
containsKey checks for the presence of a key, which can be affected by the removal of entries, making it useful to test in conjunction with remove.
